data.text:
Lleyton Hewitt Biography

Lleyton Hewitt is one of the most celebrated athletes from Australia in recent memory. Hewitt dominated the tennis world from a very young age. When he reached number one for the first time at the age of 20 in 2001, he was the youngest singles player to ever top the world rankings. That came following his victory at the 2001 U.S. Open and on the heels of Hewitt triumphing at Wimbledon the following year. Overall, he won 30 singles titles as a pro. Hewitt also got a Grand Slam doubles victory at the 2000 U.S. Open. He was named a Member of the Order of Australia in 2016.

Our speakers bureau does not claim to exclusively represent Lleyton Hewitt. We then confirm the sports celebrity fee based on the details of the request. The fees listed on the speaker profile are rough estimates based on the previous market rate for the talent. Our team then works with Lleyton Hewitt's agent, manager or assistant on the booking request. For parties interested in hiring Lleyton Hewitt, we recommend filling out the booking request form so our booking agents can help with making your next event a success.
